tool_description: a collection on news in climate change from newspapers all over the world
name: climate-paco
title: climate-paco

api_list.name: Get news on climate change
api_list.description: Get all the climate changes at the tip of your fingers.

api_list.name: Get all climate change news in english
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-paco.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-paco.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-paco.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-paco.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
